install.author: JoomlaWorks

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: jwts_id
param.label: Unique ID (required)
param.description: This ID must be unique and must only contain latin characters without any spaces or weird characters. So keep it simple, like tabbednewsleft for example. This option allows you to have multiple boxes of tabs_slides inside your template and published in any position, while being able to style each one separately.

param.name: jwts_position
param.label: Position (from which to load other modules)
param.description: Enter the name of the module position from which we load all assigned modules. Make sure that this position is NOT THE SAME POSITION in which the Tabs & Slides Module is published in!

param.name: jwts_displaytype
param.label: Content display type
param.description: Choose how to display our content.

param.name: jwts_showmodtitle
param.label: Show module title inside tabs or slides?
param.description: Choose to show or hide the module title, inside the main content in tabs or slides.
